python.Tip: Python is considered a high level language, meaning it was built on top of other languages like C.  It's built for speed and it's most common use is data analysis.
Indentation is everything in Python!  An improper indent can stop your code cold!
In Python, functions begin with a 'def' prefix in order to indicate it is a function.
Python variables are typically set to a data type.  The most common types are Strings, Numeric Types (integers, floats, ranges), Sequences (lists, tuples), and Booleans (true/false).
There are many different libraries within python that help manipulate data (pandas), visualize it (matplotlib) or format it (Jupyter Notebooks).
